page.title: The Meeting House - New Page
page.keywords: Church, Toronto, Anabaptist, Christian, Jesus, Home church, Be In Christ, Spirituality, Christianity
page.description: When’s the last time someone asked you what you believe? We’re a church that loves to ask questions, and loves people with questions. We don’t have all the answers, but exploring together is pretty much our favourite thing.
